description:
cmd/gofmt: handle ... in rewrite of calls

Fixes issue 5059.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/
LGTM (a bit ugly but seems sound)

Agreed. The problem is that the AST represents ... in CallExpr as a
token.Position only, there's no explicit field for it, and positions are
otherwise ignored.
- gri


On Tue, Apr 2, 2013 at 1:12 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM (a bit ugly but seems sound)
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8284043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8284043/>
>

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ffc56dac5a99 ***

cmd/gofmt: handle ... in rewrite of calls

Fixes issue 5059.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
